DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop oral control release formulation Huperzine A provide optimal pharmacokinetic profile drug enhance safety compliance , possible cure neurodegenerative disorder .

DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male age 18 35 , inclusive ( ASA = 1 ) 2 . Body weight > 50 kg 3 . Subject BMI le 27 20 4 . Participants able ingest oral medication 5 . The ability understand sign write informed consent form , prior participation willingness comply study requirement 1 . History drug sensitivity drug allergy 2 . History sensitivity egg 3 . Any medication take include overthecounter medication herbal product within 14 day commence study drug dose exception vitamin and/or paracetamol . When concomitant medication necessary , review investigator contraindicate , may continue dose frequency study period 7 . History clinically important illness ( ASA > 1 ) ; Disorders condition could affect absorption , distribution , metabolism and/or excretion drug ( e.g . malabsorption , edema , renal hepatic insufficiency ) 8 .
